mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CounselingForm (selectedType, email, counselingContent) VALUES (#{selectedType}, #{email}, #{counselingContent})
mapper.select: SELECT STUD_NO FROM student_user_view WHERE USERNAME = #{USERNAME}
SELECT JD_NO, PG_NAME, PG_EXPLAIN, EN_DATE, JMS_CS_DATE, TO_NO, AP_NO, PA_NO FROM JDSD_Info WHERE JD_NO = #{no} and EN_NO = "2"
